column4: How can I change the default module that is loaded? Ubuntu loads both rt2500 and rt2500pci. rt2500pci doesn't work, but rt2500 works
my card is fine in ubuntu, rt61
rt2500pci doesn't support wpa with me, but rt2500 does, so.. But it loads primarliy rt2500pci so this doesn't work
http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/wiki/index.php?title=Main_Page
rt2x00 is supposed to be better than onrmla rt2500?
yes for me
Okay i'll try compiling it
put your old module in blacklist after
Apparently I'll have to recompile the kernel too. Gives me an error saying that wireless radio is not supported by kernel
Oh well I'll try recompiling kernel
You built the rt2x00 yourself? From apt? Or did you download it manually
yes, myself
works fine
